incidents.title: Multiple Earthquake reports in Afghanistan, near Mazar-e Sharif
incidents.description: 7 reports of earthquake activity

source_tweets.text:
Magnitude-6.3 earthquake kills at least 20 people in Afghanistan

The US Geological Survey said the quake hit at a depth of 28km near Mazar-e Sharif, a city of around 523,000 people famous for its shrines and historic sites [‚Ä¶]
source_tweets.author: publicnewsfeed.mastodon.social.ap.brid.gy

source_tweets.text:
UNCAPTIONED: At Least 20 Dead After 6.3-Magnitude Earthquake Strikes Northern Afghanistan

flip.it/_75JtB
Hopefully all the dead are taliban scum
source_tweets.author: bunnyw999.bsky.social

source_tweets.text:
#Afghanistan #Earthquake #Disaster #Rescue #SeismicActivity #climate #anomaly #climatecrisis #destruction
üá¶üá´ Aftermath of the Powerful Earthquake in Northern Afghanistan

üíî According to the Ministry of Health, more than 20 people have been confirmed dead, and at least 534 have been injured.
source_tweets.author: tali-deu.bsky.social

source_tweets.text:
Afghans dig through rubble after earthquake kills at least¬†27

A boy sits next to his damaged house, in the aftermath of an earthquake, in Samangan province, Afghanistan, November 4, 2025.‚Äî Reuters Quake leaves almost 1,000 injured, destroys several buildings. Poor infrastructure causes ‚Äúimmense‚Äù‚Ä¶
source_tweets.author: 10bmnews.bsky.social

source_tweets.text:
Another earthquake has struck Afghanistan. Our hearts are with all affected. 

Afghan women‚Äîalready restricted from aid, health care, and work‚Äîsuffer most under Taliban rule. 

Gender apartheid amplifies every disaster. 

Learn more: righttolearn.ca/earthquakes-...
source_tweets.author: righttolearn.ca

source_tweets.text: Survivors of a powerful earthquake in northern Afghanistan are digging through the rubble of their homes after spending a bitterly cold night outdoors.
source_tweets.author: apnews.com

source_tweets.text: #Afghan   #Afghanistan   #earthquake

incidents.title: A 6.3 magnitude earthquake struck Mazar-e-Sharif, killing at least 20 people and
incidents.description: A 6.3 magnitude earthquake struck Mazar-e-Sharif, killing at least 20 people and injuring over 600, dating back to the 15th century Blue Mosque was affected

source_tweets.text:
Article:
The Blue Mosque of Mazar-e-Sharif which dates back to the 15th century was affected by the earthquake. At least 20 people were killed and more than 600 were injured‚Ä¶The powerful 6.3 magnitude earthquake struck just before dawn on Monday.
source_tweets.author: weather.observer

incidents.title: A massive wildfire broke out on the Walker River Reservation in June last year,
incidents.description: A massive wildfire broke out on the Walker River Reservation in June last year, with temperatures above average and 90 degrees in Schurz, Nevada that day.

source_tweets.text:
Joseph Frank was one of the first firefighters to respond to a massive wildfire that broke out on the Walker River Reservation in June last year.

Temperatures that month were well above average, according to the National Weather Service. It was 90 degrees in Schurz, Nevada that day ‚Äì 5 degrees ...
